name: Noahmund
description: Dive into a new world and discover the mysteries of Synchrony. Fight with Motion Battle Chess, an original battle system that mixes strategy and real-time action. Connect to a deeply emotional story of love and war, accompanied by a touching soundtrack influenced by the classic JRPGs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i3 2GHz and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS250 / Radeon HD5750 or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 2.2GHz and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX460 / Radeon HD6850 or better
